Text: Meere m ebere, O Chineke, meere m ebere,
Aga m akpọku Chineke nke kachasị ihe niile elu,
Ọ na-esite nʼeluigwe zidata inyeaka ma zọpụta m
O Chineke, ka e bulie gị elu karịa eluigwe niile;
Obi m dị njikere, o Chineke,
O Onyenwe anyị, aga m eto gị nʼetiti mba niile;
Nʼihi na ịhụnanya gị dị ukwuu na-eru na mbara eluigwe;
O Chineke, ka e bulie gị elu karịa eluigwe;
